MindMeld: A revolutionary technology that merges human and AI minds to create a symbiotic relationship.
BrainWave: A brain-computer interface that enables people to control devices with their thoughts.
NeuroGarden: An AI-powered mental wellness platform that uses brain-sensing technology to monitor and improve mental health.
SmartDream: A technology that enables people to record and control their dreams.
BrainWrites: An AI-powered writing tool that uses brain signals to generate creative content.
